mapper.select: SELECT city_info_name as 'cityInfoName' FROM city_info WHERE city_info_name LIKE CONCAT(#{search},'%')

SELECT city.city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', city.city_info_name as 'cityInfoName', land.landmark_info_no as 'landmarkInfoNo', land.landmark_info_name as 'landmarkInfoName' FROM city_info as city INNER JOIN landmark_info as land ON city.city_info_no = land.city_info_no WHERE city_info_name LIKE CONCAT(#{search},'%')

SELECT city.city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', city.city_info_name as 'cityInfoName', eat.eatery_no as 'eateryNo', eat.eatery_name as 'eateryName' FROM city_info as city INNER JOIN eatery_info as eat ON city.city_info_no = eat.city_info_no WHERE city_info_name LIKE CONCAT(#{search},'%')

SELECT city.city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', city.city_info_name as 'cityInfoName', eve.event_info_name as 'eventInfoName' FROM city_info as city INNER JOIN event_info as eve ON city.city_info_no = eve.city_info_no WHERE city_info_name LIKE CONCAT(#{search},'%')

SELECT city.city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', city.city_info_name as 'cityInfoName', stay.stay_info_no as 'stayInfoNo', stay.stay_info_name as 'stayInfoName' FROM city_info as city INNER JOIN stay_info as stay ON city.city_info_no = stay.city_info_no WHERE city_info_name LIKE CONCAT(#{search},'%')

SELECT landmark_info_no as 'landmarkInfoNo', landmark_info_name as 'landmarkInfoName', city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', landmark_info_location as 'landmarkInfoLocation', landmark_info_homepage as 'landmarkInfoHomepage', landmark_info_summary as 'landmarkInfoSummary', landmark_info_langitude as 'landmarkInfoLangitude', landmark_info_latitude as 'landmarkInfoLatitude', landmark_info_image as 'landmarkInfoImage', landmark_info_fee as 'landmarkInfoFee' FROM landmark_info WHERE landmark_info_no = #{landmarkInfoNoRma}
